ple are affected by lamellar ichthyosis ?,"Lamellar ichthyosis is estimated to affect 1 in 100,000 individuals in the United States. This condition is more common in Norway, where an estimated 1 in 91,000 individuals are affected.",GHR,lamellar ichthyosis
What are the genetic changes related to lamellar ichthyosis ?,"Mutations in one of many genes can cause lamellar ichthyosis. These genes provide instructions for making proteins that are found in the outermost layer of the skin (the epidermis).
